WEATHER FORECAST FOR 23 May 2023
Issued at 05.30 a.m. on 23 May 2023

S
howers or thundershowers will occur at several places in Eastern and Uva provinces and in
Polonnaruwa and Mullaitivu districts during the evening or night.
A few showers may occur in coastal areas of  Western, Southern and Northwestern  provinces
during the morning too.
General  public  is  kindly  requested  to  take  adequate  precautions  to  minimize  damages
caused by temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
